title: Riot fault
body: YOur client is having issues and crashing and it does it to me now I have a que ban fix your problem and fix my dang account

replies.body:
Hey Tenmirs Blk Bear, 

Do you by any chance use the program LoL Replay? This program has been making players clients crash. If you're not using this program and your client is continously crashing we suggest you trying this KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

If you're still having issues after you may want to send in a ticket to Riot's tech team.
